JoyPiAdvanced.LCD16x2_ReturnHome: Sets cursos back to first position
JoyPiAdvanced.LCD16x2_showText: show a String in LCD at a specific position
JoyPiAdvanced.buttonmatrixPressed: Determine which row and column was pressed
JoyPiAdvanced.buttonmatrixPressedValue: Determine the value of the pressed button
JoyPiAdvanced.matrixRainbow: Cyle through all colors in rainbow mode
JoyPiAdvanced.matrixSetPixel: Set pixel to color on position x - y
